channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
I follow the [TUT] on how to make a server - to stop the quesions by God of Ikiliki except when i try to use a server status page it says that my server is offline.
1. My runserver in running.
2. I have the correct port it runs with (43594)
3. im an advanced coder so dont tell me something is wrong for what i did.. i followed step by step..
Thanks for helping.

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:2, topic:176617”]LoL k, it pings your server to see if it gets a response
but if its online that leaves ONE, count em, ONE thing you need to do
firewall exceptions --> add program[/quote]

I have no idea what your talking about…

I need a hoster anyway.

This is soo confusing.

Read full topic
